author: gmazza
msg: Moved the Translator (resource bundle) creation from AWTStarter to AWTRenderer.
Gave the AWTRenderer access to the PrintViewer frame that displays the document.
Moved rendering status messages from AWTStarter to AWTRenderer and PrintDialog.

author: gmazza
msg: Fix:  setOptions() for AWTRenderer not being called.

author: gmazza
msg: Removed empty setProducer() from AWTRenderer; can rely on base class.

author: gmazza
msg: 1.  To facilitate comprehension of the Renderer classes, added the remaining three methods in the Renderer interface to AbstractRenderer: startRenderer(), stopRenderer(), and setupFontInfo().  SetupFontInfo() remains abstract, the other two have blank definitions.
2.  Removed the blank definitions of startRenderer() and stopRenderer() from PrintRenderer, these are now defined in AbstractRenderer.

3.  Member string variables "producer" and "creator" were added to AbstractRenderer and are now populated by its setProducer() and setCreator() methods; removed these functions from the several subclasses that were handling these strings equivalently.

author: gmazza
msg: Safer handling of treebuilder variable within Driver.reset(), also Driver.setRenderer(renderer) will now set the rendererType variable when given an AWTRenderer.
